meanings.definition: The state of being exclusive or limited to a particular group or individual.
meanings.sent1: The exclusivities of the VIP club made everyone feel special.
meanings.sent2: She cherished the exclusivities of her private beach house.
meanings.sent3: The exclusivities of the secret party were revealed by accident.
meanings.sent4: His exclusivities in fashion always turned heads.
meanings.sent5: The exclusivities of the ancient artifact were carefully preserved.

meanings.definition: The quality of being unique or not shared with others.
meanings.sent1: The exclusivities of her handmade jewelry set it apart from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The exclusivities of his talent made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The exclusivities of the unicorn's horn made it the envy of all other creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her exclusivities in baking created mouthwatering treats.
meanings.sent5: The exclusivities of the rare flower attracted many admirers.
